Simon Morgan

Web developer

Web developer and Technical Lead with over 10 years agency experience. My primary focus is on front end development but also have experience of backend development and CMS integration (Wordpress, Umbraco, Drupal). My core skills are HTML, CSS and Javascript working primarily on CMS based projects.

I have experience of project scoping, writing technical/functional documention and supervision of other developers throughout development projects.
